Text.Value: *She meets your eye, and the fear there hardens into rage. She gathers herself.*

EditorData.NodeContext: Desperately angry and afraid - but determind to attack the goblins and peck their eyes out.

Text.Value: Tired. Frightened. A game to the featherless ones - but not a game! Not a game!
Yes! Bite and claw and tear and bite!

EditorData.AnimationTags: Chicken gets confidence, readys into fighting stance
EditorData.NodeContext: Desperately angry and afraid - but determind to attack the goblins and peck their eyes out.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Chicken tired but very scared, anxious loop
EditorData.NodeContext: The chicken is terrified. She's being chased by goblins and fears she will be eaten.
Player has been cruel to her. Player was her one chance at safety and its been take away from her - she's in despair

Text.Value: Wild things do not beg for help. They protect themselves.
*The chicken's head bobs, eyes darting around at the leering goblin faces. She's terrified.*

EditorData.NodeContext: Appealing directly to the player for help. Hoping anyone will save her.

EditorData.AnimationTags: show Chicken perking up with hope and excitment
EditorData.NodeContext: Player has told her of a way to get out. Can't quite believe she might escape. Afraid but hopeful.

Text.Value: You are a noble fowl. Fast. Sharp. VENGEFUL!

EditorData.NodeContext: Appealing directly to the player for help. Hoping anyone will save her.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Chicken squawk, head movement to sell sound

Text.Value: *She shies away in fear, not understanding.*
Tired. Lie down. But don't want to burn.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Chicken exhausted, posture low, giving up hope
EditorData.NodeContext: The chicken has been running from her captors for a long time. She's terrified but exhausted and doesn't know how much longer she can keep going.

Text.Value: No. Too many goblins. Too many dead before me!

EditorData.NodeContext: Terrified. Player has suggested she attack the goblins but she's too afraid and too upset - she's seen them kill other chickens right before her eyes

Text.Value: I'll help. Just run through the posts, and you'll be free.
*She shrinks from your voice - just another leering face sent to torment her.*

EditorData.NodeContext: Terrified. Player has suggested she attack the goblins but she's too afraid and too upset.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Chicken looks around frantically for an escape, terrified
EditorData.NodeContext: The chicken is trying to flee the goblins that chase her. She's panicked and looking for an exit.

Text.Value: You'll be free just as soon as you run through the posts.

Synopsis: This chicken is being used as the 'ball' in a goblin sport. The goblins chase it around an enclosure, trying to make it run between two posts so that they can score a 'goal'. It's exhausted and frightened.
